name: Z4S4 Grumpy Cat
description: 8 Flugzeuge und Autos sollten langsamer fliegen. Dann wäre unsere Luft auch wieder so weiß und rein wie ein frisches Papiertaschentuch.Tardar Sauce (born April 4, 2012), commonly known as Grumpy Cat, is a cat Internet and media personality and actress. She is known for her permanently "grumpy" facial appearance, which is caused by an underbite and feline dwarfism.
